General.Name: PSG Corp. PCL
General.Description: PSG Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, operates as a construction contractor in Thailand. Its projects include industrial and power plants, residencies, hospitals, shopping malls, and warehouses. The company offers civil engineering services, including civil, reinforced concrete structures, steel structures, architectural engineering, landscape, and road design services; indoor and outdoor engineering system installation services, such as electrical, energy management, telecommunications, air conditioning, sanitation, and fire protection systems; and engineering procurement construction services to petrochemical and renewable energy sectors. It also provides plant and building construction, and other related services. The company was formerly known as T Engineering Corporation Public Company Limited and changed its name to PSG Corporation Public Company Limited in October 2021. PSG Corporation Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

4.Name: Ms. Pathamakorn  Buranasin
4.Title: Company Sec., Chief Compliance Officer & MD
